item.title: Nowhere else to put this (about WoW servers)
item.dc:creator: @Mattymat1313 Mattymat1313
item.description:
@Mattymat1313 wrote:

Well if u wanna try out a private server u can do so:

  1. go to Worldofwarcraft.com and go to where it says trial
  2. sign up for the free trial so u can also download burning crusade.
  3. After downloading the installer click on it and it should start downloading.(this is a torrent seeded by the blizzard servers so u should get acceptable speeds)

4.install using the setup.
5. go to wowscape.net and sign up there to make a character name.
6. then register to one of the servers there.
7. then go to your folder where world of warcraft was installed and go to the file realmlist.wtf and u will see an ip adress there.
8.Then depending on which server u registered on u would replace that ip right there with one of the ipâ€™s below that u registered on:
WoWscape IP: 75.126.215.219 Funserver

WoWlegion IP: 75.126.214.118 blizz-like

WoWcrack IP: 75.126.214.116 High Rate (no-custome made items)

Or u can just forget about all the stuff i said above and just actually use the free trial XD.

Read full topic
